title: mahimai ariya
sahitya:
mahimai ariya taramA rAmA en pizhai mannippadOr bhAramA marai pugazhum nin


anupallavi

  sakala jagannAthA yuga praLayattilum sAdhu janangaL sadA bhajikkum tiru nAma


caraNam    kAkAsuran koDum pizhai ninaind-doru pullai
 venkaNai enat-toDuttAi IrEzulagil pughal inri kAkA dayAkarA annai
 sudhA manOharA enakkadara irangi Or kaNNODuyir koduttAi nin
